solution_line_template: You first need to know the total weight of the vegetables, so you add each quantity: {carrots_kg} + {zucchini_kg} + {broccoli_kg} = <<{carrots_kg}+{zucchini_kg}+{broccoli_kg}={total_vegetables_kg}>>{total_vegetables_kg} kg

Then you have to find half of {total_vegetables_kg}: {total_vegetables_kg}/{sold_fraction_denominator} = <<{total_vegetables_kg}/{sold_fraction_denominator}={sold_vegetables_kg}>>{sold_vegetables_kg} kg.
